## ðŸ› Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a potential security issue in this repository or any other VTS project:

1. **Do not create a public GitHub issue or pull request.**  
   Public issues may expose sensitive details.

2. **Privately disclose the issue** by one of the following methods:
   - Using GitHubâ€™s built-in [Private Vulnerability Reporting](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/security-advisories/guidance-on-reporting-and-managing-vulnerabilities#privately-reporting-a-security-vulnerability)
   - Or email: **security@shrtx.in**

3. Include as much information as possible:
   - Description of the vulnerability  
   - Steps to reproduce  
   - Affected versions (if applicable)  
   - Suggested mitigation (optional)

Weâ€™ll acknowledge receipt within **48 hours**, provide a status update within **7 days**, and release a patch once verified.

## ðŸ§© Disclosure Policy

- All verified vulnerabilities will be patched as soon as possible.
